name: West Coast Veggie Burgers

ingredients.name: natural peanut butter or seed butter

preparation:
1. Cut off and discard crusts from bread. Tear bread into small pieces. Grate zucchini; you should have about 2 cups. Drain and rinse chickpeas. Place in a food processor; add peanut butter and seasoning. Pulse until mixture is well mixed, but still has a few chunky pieces and starts to come together; form into four patties.  
  2. Heat oil in a large non-stick fry pan over high heat. Add patties; reduce heat to medium and fry 5 min per side, or until crisp and brown on the outside and warmed through. Add more oil, if needed. 
  3. Tuck patties into buns and add toppings, if desired.
tips:
Prep patties ahead of time so the flavours can blend. Refrigerate up to 3 days before cooking. 

Be gentle when flipping patties overâ€”while they hold together, they squish easily.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced fresh veggies of your choice.
